import { useState } from "react"; import Edit from "./Edit"; const Whatever = ({ id, note, date, time, item, add }) => { const [anote, setAnote] = useState(note); const [adate, setAdate] = useState(date); const [atime, setAtime] = useState(time); function updateNote(e) { setAnote(e.target.value); } function updateDate(e) { setAdate(e.target.value); } function updateTime(e) { setAtime(e.target.value); } // function updateEdit() { // function(prev) { // const index = prev.find((item)=>item.id===id) // add // } const updatedMemo = { id, anote, adate, atime }; return (
Modal title
); }; export default Whatever;
